CustomField.description: Ticket #81824 - 3/12/2025 - LF: Updated to Event Note. Previously used as "Event Manager Note" Enter in an update about what has happened recently for this event. Each note about the event will be stored in the Event Manager Notes History.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter an update about this event. Each note about the event will be stored in the Event Notes History.
CustomField.label: Event Note
